pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yānagatassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.3.1_0: “Na yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.5_0: vayhaṁ ratho sakaṭaṁ sandamānikā sivikā pāṭaṅkī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk63:1.7_0: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca yānagatassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
